decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Window details in report entitled: Georgian Report, Order No: S130050149, report date: 13/02/2014, received 19/02/2014. Front Elevation, sheet 1 of 1, dated 10/03/2014, received 13/03/2014. Front Door Plan, Drawing No: MSC\Special, sheet A4, received 25/04/2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those specified on the application form and approved plans in Condition 1 above.
description: Replacement of existing windows and door to the front elevation
